ehi di wadiduratath adahas dak wu amathiwaraya sandahan kale wi mila di ganna madhyasthana ha gabada bharakaruwan, alewi niyojithayange nam pawa sandahan karamin puwathpath danwimak da palakala bawayi.ema puwathpath danwima palakirimen pasuwa wi mila di ganime thawath madhyasthana gananawak pihituwa athi athara niyamitha milak yatathe wi aswanna alewi kirime hakiyawa gowi janathawata labi athi bawath amathiwaraya kiya.gowi janathawage wi aswanna miladi ganimata rajayata kisidu wadapiliwelak nomathi bawata wipaksha nayakaya wiwidha prakasha sidukara athi athara ema prakashawala kisidu padanamak nomathi bawath amathiwaraya kiya.eksath jathika paksha palana samaye di gowi janathawata sethak salasuye di. es. senanayaka, dadli senanayaka wani jana nayakayan pamanak bawath amathiwaraya kiya.ranil wikramasinha mahatha pramukha eksath jathika pakshaya wi alewi mandalaya ahosi kirima, eyata adala depola mulumaninma wikuna damima, gowi janathawa winasha kirimata pimbaurupath sakas kala aakaraya aadiya da amathiwaraya sihipath kaleya.
